Post._content:
APPAMP
<!--more-->

AMPAccelerated Mobile Pages Project


`hexo-generator-amp`
 

```
npm install hexo-generator-amp --save
```

`themes/icarus/layout/common/head.ejs`

```
<% if (is_post() && config.generator_amp){ %>
  <link rel="amphtml" href="<%= config.url %><%= config.root %><%= page.path %>/amp/index.html">
<% } %>
```
`_config.yml`

```
# hexo-generator-amp
# The following settings is the quick start options.

generator_amp:
  templateDir:  amp-template
  assetDistDir: amp-dist
  logo:
    path:   sample/sample-logo.png
    width:  600
    height: 60
  substituteTitleImage:
    path:   sample/sample-substituteTitleImage.png
    width:  1024
    height: 800
  warningLog: false   # To display warning, please set true.
```

Post.title: Icarus
Post._content:
icarus ### Widgets `icarus/_config.yml` ```bash # Widgets widgets: - ``` ### Archives hexo `_config.yml` ```bash # Pagination ## Set per_page to 0 to disable pagination per_page: 10 pagination_dir: page # hexo-generator-archive archive_generator: per_page: 0 ``` ### Social links `icarus/_config.yml` ```bash social_links: github: / twitter: / facebook: / dribbble: / rss: / ``` ### Article & `icarus/layout/common/article.ejs` ```bash
<%- partial('share/index', { post: post }) %> <%- partial('comment/counter', { post: post }) %>
``` ### Font size `icarus/source/css/_variables.styl` ```bash font-size = 16px line-height = 1.7em line-height-title = 1.4em ``` ### About api `source/about/index.md` ```javascript
``` ### Footer aboutfooter `icarus/layout/common/footer.ejs` ```bash
© <%= date(new Date(), 'YYYY') %> <%= config.author || config.title %> &
```
